text: [Music]
rebby media is one of the world's
leading broadcast - services providers
and we service majority of broadcast
customers globally including brands like
such as BBC ITV channel 4 we deliver 78%
of the television in Europe in our
business today we have 3000 racks of
equipment which is substantial I mean
it's bigger than majority of banks and
mining companies it is an astronomical
size and whether that comes a lot of
challenges the biggest one is time to
deploy rebbe media with AWS has gone
from six-month deployment time to three
days which is incredible we do a huge
amount of workloads in AWS as a business
we process three million media assets a
year and we deliver those assets to
multiple different locations and all of
that is done in AWS we've built our own
ecosystem the way we track manage search
assets so using things like DynamoDB the
way we use analytics the way we do our
workflows our workflows and managed by
step functions we've really changed the
entire model the way we used to buy
monolithic systems it's all due to those
different services the deployment times
has just made us super agile the media
landscape has evolved and the customers
now want something different it won't on
demand pricing they want you to scale as
they require so when somebody has a big
event formula one for example you can
scale your infrastructure spin up more
services and deliver those as and when
required and then just shut them down we
identified working with AWS for numerous
reasons firstly the support they gave us
the quantity of services that is in
their portfolio it's a great strength
and allows us to new services that
previously wasn't available there's a
lot of challenges in doing today we use
60 different services within the AWS
portfolio and really the major benefit
is the scale the reliability the
security and the cost-effectiveness
[Music]
